belt.name: Belt of the Wailing Barnacle

belt.name: Daring Deceiver's Belt

belt.name: Fearless Bone Crusher Belt

belt.name: Ferryman Belt

belt.name: Frostbite Belt

belt.name: Frozen Horizon Belt

boots.name: Aristocrat Boots
boots.description: Boots so beautiful, your underlings will be lining up to lick them.

boots.name: Bell Brigade Boots
boots.description: It may not be an exciting task, but keeping your boots polished is a military mandate.

boots.name: Black Dog Boots
boots.description: Made for creeping around with shadowy footsteps, but easily lost if you take them off in the dark.

boots.name: Boots of Courage
boots.description: You feel very brave when wearing these boots. Maybe it's the five-inch lifts.

boots.name: Boots of the Wailing Barnacle
boots.description: These boots have walked across the seabed in search of underwater artefacts!

boots.name: Courage of Captaincy Boots
boots.description: Boots with claws. Tread carefully when wearing them so as not to ruin your new Captain's Rugs.

boots.name: Daring Deceiver's Boots

costumes.name: Anamaria Costume
costumes.description: Dress as the fearless Anamaria and you'll be ready for any adventure, no matter how strange.

costumes.name: Baleful Bloom Costume 1
costumes.description: After a tropical pleasure cruise was beset by a brutal tempest, this summery outfit was the only thing the one surviving tourist could wear.

costumes.name: Baleful Bloom Costume 2
costumes.description: As the mysterious flower on their necklace began to bloom, this marooned mariner's body sprouted floral protrusions…

costumes.name: Baleful Bloom Costume 3
costumes.description: Now nothing but a host for a parasitic plant, this poor pirate merely serves to spread its spores across the Sea of Thieves.

costumes.name: Barrel Bombardier Costume (Goggles)
costumes.description: Don't stand near an open flame in this soot-stained outfit festooned with wicks, fuses and all manner of flammable material. Includes a set of goggles.

costumes.name: Barrel Bombardier Costume (Messy hairstyle and goggles)
costumes.description: Don't stand near an open flame in this soot-stained outfit festooned with wicks, fuses and all manner of flammable material. Includes a set of goggles and a messy hairstyle.

costumes.name: Barrel Bombardier Costume (No goggles)
costumes.description: Don't stand near an open flame in this soot-stained outfit festooned with wicks, fuses and all manner of flammable material.

costumes.name: Bonechiller Costume (Beard)
costumes.description: Dress as a fabled Skeleton Lord, who punishes selfish pirates during the Festival of Giving.

costumes.name: Bonechiller Costume (No beard)
costumes.description: Dress as a fabled Skeleton Lord, who punishes selfish pirates during the Festival of Giving.

costumes.name: Captain Barbossa Costume (Beard)
costumes.description: A costume inspired by a treacherous Captain and his many dark deeds. Comes with a unique beard.

costumes.name: Captain Barbossa Costume (No beard)
costumes.description: A costume inspired by a treacherous Captain and his many dark deeds. Leaves your pirate clean-shaven.

costumes.name: Captain Jack Sparrow Classic Costume (Beard)
costumes.description: Dress as the legendary Captain Jack Sparrow with this faithful recreation of his memorable outfit - including a Wiggle Emote and Jack's distinctive beard.

costumes.name: Captain Jack Sparrow Classic Costume (No beard)
costumes.description: Dress as the legendary Captain Jack Sparrow with this faithful recreation of his memorable outfit - including a Wiggle Emote and clean-shaven to show off your pirate's features.

costumes.name: Creeping Cold Costume 1
costumes.description: This rime-coloured costume is said to be the preferred regalia of frozen freebooters who sail on icy winds.

costumes.name: Creeping Cold Costume 2
costumes.description: Pirates who linger in the glacial northern seas may find their skin turning blue and their eyes a ghostly white.

costumes.name: Creeping Cold Costume 3
costumes.description: Their ships frozen in time, their bodies living icicles - the ultimate fate of pirates who succumb to the creeping cold.

costumes.name: Crimson Crypt Costume
costumes.description: Complete with its beady red eye, don this ominous outfit and perch atop your nearest crow’s nest for maximum fear factor.

costumes.name: Dark Warsmith Costume
costumes.description: Don the mantle of the Dark Warsmith, a fabled Skeleton Captain who wished only to be the most feared pirate on the Sea of Thieves.

costumes.name: Davy Jones Cursed Costume (Beard)
costumes.description: Dress as the notorious Davy Jones and teach others to fear the eternal abyss. Comes complete with a unique beard.

costumes.name: Davy Jones Cursed Costume (No beard)
costumes.description: Dress as the notorious Davy Jones and teach others to fear the eternal abyss. Leaves your pirate cleans-shaven.

costumes.name: Forest's Blessing Costume 1
costumes.description: A forest guardian. Garbed in robes of pink and green. Ready and alert.

costumes.name: Forest's Blessing Costume 2
costumes.description: Twisted roots take hold. Blossom falls - gift from the trees. Nature's rich embrace.

costumes.name: Forest's Blessing Costume 3
costumes.description: Flesh wooden, skin bark. You are one with the forest. Transformed and complete.

costumes.name: Gibbs Costume
costumes.description: Dress as the capable Gibbs and lend a spot of seafaring experience to any pirate crew.

costumes.name: Golden Nile Costume
costumes.description: Wearing this crocodile-themed ensemble, no-one can call you anything other than a snappy dresser.

costumes.name: Islehopper Outlaw Costume
costumes.description: Nothing says 'Hello, we're here to rob you!' quite like glow-in-the-dark goggles, bandana and fishbone mohawk.

costumes.name: Jack O' Looter Costume
costumes.description: Dress your pirate as the Jack O' Looter, a mythical menace who would trick miserly pirates... to death!

costumes.name: Lionfish Costume (Mask)
costumes.description: With this costume's royal array of colours, strut into any room and hold court like you're the ruler of the coral. Comes with a distinctive lionfish mask.

costumes.name: Lionfish Costume (No mask)
costumes.description: With this costume's royal array of colours, strut into any room and hold court like you're the ruler of the coral.

costumes.name: Lodestar Costume (No hairstyle)
costumes.description: With its glowing constellations, this cosmic costume doubles as a handy star map for navigating on cloudy nights. Leaves pirates to pick their own hair and beard.

costumes.name: Lodestar Costume (Starry hairstyle)
costumes.description: With its glowing constellations, this cosmic costume doubles as a handy star map for navigating on cloudy nights. Comes with a starry hairstyle, and leaves pirates to pick their own beard.

costumes.name: Lunar Festival Costume (Hat off)
costumes.description: Make an impact this year with a regal red, gold and black Eastern-inspired costume.

costumes.name: Lunar Festival Costume (Hat on)
costumes.description: Make an impact this year with a regal red, gold and black Eastern-inspired costume.

costumes.name: Mandrake Costume (Plain)
costumes.description: Half human, half plant, all deadly - dress up as the flesh-eating Mandrake with this thorny outfit.

costumes.name: Mandrake Costume (Tinted skin)
costumes.description: Half human, half plant, all deadly - dress up as the flesh-eating Mandrake with this thorny outfit.

costumes.name: Prehistoric Plunderer Costume
costumes.description: Studded with dinosaur bones and turning your skin to amber, let out your best primeval roar with this jurassic costume!

costumes.name: Rogue Tinkerer Captain Costume
costumes.description: Dress as the mechanically minded captain of a ship you've tweaked and improved.

costumes.name: Rogue Tinkerer Crew Costume 1
costumes.description: An inventor's garb, worn by a clever crewmate who's loyal to their captain.

costumes.name: Rogue Tinkerer Crew Costume 2
costumes.description: An inventor's garb, worn by a clever crewmate who's loyal to their captain.

costumes.name: Rogue Tinkerer Crew Costume 3
costumes.description: An inventor's garb, worn by a clever crewmate who's loyal to their captain.

costumes.name: Ruby Splashtail Monarch Costume
costumes.description: The Splashtail Monarch in folklore provides bounty from the sea... and maybe the occasional nightmare.

costumes.name: Scrum Costume
costumes.description: Dress as the scheming Scrum to display your admiration for Captain Jack Sparrow... and for gold!

costumes.name: Sea of Sands Captain Costume
costumes.description: The glorious apparel of a captain from the desert kingdoms, ornate and surprisingly breathable!

costumes.name: Sea of Sands Crew Costume 1
costumes.description: A rugged desert costume that befits the bazaars and dunes of the east.

costumes.name: Sea of Sands Crew Costume 2
costumes.description: A shiny outfit preferred by the sailors of the east, brightly coloured and cool in the sun.

costumes.name: Sea of Sands Crew Costume 3
costumes.description: This costume is popular in the desert, where the nights are often as hot as the days.

costumes.name: Shining Pegasus Costume 1
costumes.description: Golden locks and a full beard contrast with marble-like skin to create a truly heavenly costume.

costumes.name: Shining Pegasus Costume 2
costumes.description: A dazzling halo of golden curls contrasts with marble-like skin to create a truly heavenly costume.

costumes.name: Shrouded Ghost Hunter Costume (Plain)
costumes.description: Hunt down pirates and Megalodons alike in a costume adorned with grisly trophies.

costumes.name: Shrouded Ghost Hunter Costume (White-Skinned)
costumes.description: Some pirates become so obsessed with finding the Shrouded Ghost that they take on its appearance.

costumes.name: Soulflame Captain Costume
costumes.description: An ethereal ensemble befitting the Soulflame Captain, a terrifying Pirate Legend.

costumes.name: Soulflame First Crewmate Costume
costumes.description: Ghostly garb worn by a crew loyal to their Soulflame Captain, a Pirate Legend.

costumes.name: Soulflame Second Crewmate Costume
costumes.description: Ghostly garb worn by a crew loyal to their Soulflame Captain, a Pirate Legend.

costumes.name: Soulflame Third Crewmate Costume
costumes.description: Ghostly garb worn by a crew loyal to their Soulflame Captain, a Pirate Legend.

costumes.name: Wrecker Wrangler Costume
costumes.description: Inspired by the Wreckers that dweall down in the darkness, this might just scare the living daylights out of your fellow divers.

costumes.name: Athena's Fortune Costume
costumes.description: This complete outfit is a ready-made style, for Legends who fight and drink all the while.

costumes.name: Gold Hoarders Costume
costumes.description: Your lust for gold has earned you the right to wear this time-honoured attire.

costumes.name: Legendary Treasure Seeker Costume
costumes.description: This full outfit for a Pirate Legend is a jaunty combination of swagger, fabric and gold.

costumes.name: Merchant Alliance Costume
costumes.description: Please conduct yourself professionally while wearing the Alliance uniform.

costumes.name: Order of Souls Costume
costumes.description: The risks you take for the Order deserve recognition through our sacred garments.

costumes.name: Reaper's Bones Costume
costumes.description: Your passion is admirable - ensure that your garb is equally striking.

costumes.name: Veil of the Ancients Costume
costumes.description: Dressed in Ancient attire and donning a replica of the Veil, you look ready to the reach the Sea of the Damned.

dress.name: Aristocrat Dress

gloves.name: Aristocrat Gloves
gloves.description: Gloves of such soft fabric, your opponent may not even realise they've been slapped with one.

gloves.name: Bell Brigade Gloves
gloves.description: No military uniform is truly complete without a pair of matching gloves.

gloves.name: Black Dog Gloves
gloves.description: Hands that do dark deeds need gloves to match.

gloves.name: Courage of Captaincy Gloves
gloves.description: Thick gloves that protect against the elements, but make it hard to write in the Captain's Log.

gloves.name: Daring Deceiver's Gloves
gloves.description: Whether it's palming a coin or concealing a blade, you can do a lot with thick gloves like these.

gloves.name: Fearless Bone Crusher Gloves
gloves.description: You can only wonder why you didn't think to adorn your fists with bones sooner.

gloves.name: Ferryman Gloves
gloves.description: Found in the Ferry's list property barrel, hopefully you'll get a matching pair.

gloves.name: Frostbite Gloves
gloves.description: Gloves are perfect for chilly nights - frozen fingers can't play shanties, after all.

gloves.name: Frozen Horizon Gloves
gloves.description: Tough, thick gloves covered in icy shards. Try to avoid shaking hands.

gloves.name: Gilded Phoenix Gloves
gloves.description: Shiny, elegant gloves that surely aren't for dark deeds. But appearances can be deceiving...

gloves.name: Gloves of the Wailing Barnacle

gloves.name: Golden Banana Gloves
gloves.description: Sturdy gloves for handling Golden Bananas safely.

gloves.name: Legendary Gloves
gloves.description: A legend on their crew everyone loves, wave your thanks with these prime gloves.

gloves.name: Locked-Up Gloves
gloves.description: Are these gloves fashioned from manacles, or are they the result of a successful jailbreak? Your foes will be left wondering...

gloves.name: Lucky Hand Gloves
gloves.description: The perfect fashion accessory for a pirate who doesn’t like to show their hand.

gloves.name: Morningstar Gloves

gloves.name: Eastern Winds Jade Gloves
gloves.description: Rumoured to be made from dragon skin, the inside of these gloves exude a pleasant warmth.

gloves.name: Ghost Gloves
gloves.description: Many hands make light work, so gain yourself a helping hand or two with these enchanted gloves.

gloves.name: Cultured Aristocrat Gloves
gloves.description: Gloves of such soft fabric, your opponent may not even realise they’ve been slapped with one.

gloves.name: Dawn Hunter Gloves
gloves.description: Sturdy enough to help you throttle the life out of your foes.

gloves.name: Foul Rotten Bilge Rat Gloves
gloves.description: Years of not-so-honest hard work has worn away these once pristine gloves.

gloves.name: Gloves of the Silent Barnacle
gloves.description: Don’t be surprised if there’s a starfish living inside one or both of these gloves.

gloves.name: Renegade Sea Dog Gloves
gloves.description: Plenty of room to slip a few coins inside to fight your way out of any tavern brawl.

gloves.name: Scorched Forsaken Ashes Gloves
gloves.description: The tough gloves of a pirate who knows what’s too hot to handle.

gloves.name: Sunshine Parrot Gloves
gloves.description: Not just stylised parrot gloves, but also great gloves for handling parrots. Those beaks are sharp!

gloves.name: Thriving Wild Rose Gloves
gloves.description: Pretty but tougher than they seem, just like Rose - actually, she said the same about George.

gloves.name: Venomous Kraken Gloves
gloves.description: Gloves that are fit for wrangling a slippery tentacle!

gloves.name: Nightfall Hunter Gloves
gloves.description: Sturdy enough to help you throttle the life out of your foes.

gloves.name: Dark Adventurers Gloves
gloves.description: The perfect accessory for steering the ship while staring moodily at the horizon.

hat.name: Accomplished Aristocrat Hat
hat.description: With a stunning sapphire and perky feather, this hat absolutely must be worn at a rakish angle.

hat.name: Aristocrat Hat
hat.description: This hat is perfect, but your hair is perfect too. Decisions, decisions...

hat.name: Bell Brigade Hat
hat.description: This enormous headwear isn’t just for show - you can store your grog inside it, too.

hat.name: Belle's Hat
hat.description: Belle's arrival on the Sea of Thieves caused such a stir, it was only a matter of time until her style caught on.

hat.name: Black Dog Hat
hat.description: Almost as black as the nefarious thoughts in your head.

hat.name: Bone Crusher Hat
hat.description: You found the skeleton thrones, now you wear the skeleton bones.

hat.name: Briggsy’s Hat
hat.description: Briggsy's hat is a very grand affair, but like so many beautiful things, it hid an ugly reality

hat.name: Courage of Captaincy Hat
hat.description: A hat that resembles a valiant lion. Words with a captain's pride!

hat.name: Cursed Captain's Hat

hat.name: Daring Deceiver's Hat

hat.name: Fearless Bone Crusher Hat
hat.description: Some might see this hat and call you ‘bonehead’, but only once.

hat.name: Ferryman Hat
hat.description: Lesser hats sometimes slip down over eyes and cause Ferry visits, but this hat fits very tightly.

hat.name: Frostbite Hat

hat.name: Frozen Horizon Hat

hat.name: Gilded Phoenix Hat

hat.name: Golden Banana Hat

hat.name: Hat of the Moonlit Barnacle

hat.name: Hat of The Wailing Barnacle
hat.description: You may get the odd fishy look, but this hat belongs to a true sea-lover.

hat.name: Morningstar Hat

hat.name: Sailor Hat

jacket.name: Aristocrat Jacket
jacket.description: You didn't say 'best-dressed buccaneer', but if people want to say it about you, let them.

jacket.name: Bell Brigade Jacket
jacket.description: A smart coat befitting soldiers who tirelessly defend the spirit of the season.

jacket.name: Black Dog Jacket
jacket.description: Some say it's a shroud that wraps your body in mysterious darkness. Others say it's just a jacket.

jacket.name: Bone Crusher Jacket
jacket.description: A jacket adorned with bones, perfect for thrill-seekers and taxidermists.

jacket.name: Courage of Captaincy Jacket
jacket.description: A bright violet jacket, because a ship's Captain should never settle for being inconspicuous.

jacket.name: Daring Deceiver's Jacket
jacket.description: NOTE: Tricks up your sleeves not included.

jacket.name: Fearless Bone Crusher Jacket
jacket.description: A jacket adorned with bones, perfect for thrill-seekers and taxidermists.

jacket.name: Ferryman Jacket
jacket.description: For decades the Ferry Captain's been working on an anti-Ferry coating, but it's not quite there yet.

jacket.name: Frostbite Jacket
jacket.description: A thick jacket that keeps out the cold. Handy if you're stuck up in the crow's nest.

jacket.name: Frozen Horizon Jacket
jacket.description: Despite its decidedly chilly appearance, this jacket is actually rather cosy…

jacket.name: Gilded Phoenix Jacket
jacket.description: The Gilded Phoenix Jacket is inspirationally bright and clean... will your conduct be the same?

jacket.name: Gold Hoarder Jacket
jacket.description: Wear this trophy of the Gold Hoarders with pride, but don't get too greedy now...

jacket.name: Golden Banana Jacket
jacket.description: A banana-yellow jacket, perfect for true pirates and people who like being chased by monkeys.

jacket.name: Grimm's Jacket
jacket.description: A coat modelled after the fiery finery worn by Captain Grimm. Impersonate him at your own risk…

jacket.name: Jacket of The Wailing Barnacle
jacket.description: You fell in the drink so often that you decided to embrace it. Never mind the barnacles.

jacket.name: Legendary Jacket
jacket.description: Now joined the legends you can choose to gloat, if this is your wish here's the perfect coat.

jacket.name: Lucky Hand Jacket
jacket.description: The trim of this jacket is coloured red and black to symbolise the colours of playing cards. Perfect for a suit of suits.

jacket.name: Merrick's Jacket
jacket.description: A replica of Merrick's famous jacket. All of the style, none of the splashtail stains.

jacket.name: Morningstar Jacket
jacket.description: Like its twin dress, this is the seventh of eight uniform pieces.

bottoms.name: Aristocrat Trousers
bottoms.description: They're not 'brown' trousers; rather, they're an exquisite melding of hand-picked, earthy hues.

bottoms.name: Bell Brigade Trousers
bottoms.description: Royal green trousers for the troops. Try not to get them dirty during combat.

bottoms.name: Black Dog Trousers
bottoms.description: Their plain black simplicity creates a subtle air of mystery. Also hides the dirt really well too.

bottoms.name: Courage of Captaincy Trousers
bottoms.description: Even famous Captains put these on one leg at a time, just like everyone else.

bottoms.name: Daring Deceiver's Trousers
bottoms.description: Well-cut trousers are a key part of any swindler's attire, and come with many secret pockets.

bottoms.name: Fearless Bone Crusher Trousers
bottoms.description: Even your trousers have bones... you know what, never mind.

bottoms.name: Ferryman Trousers
bottoms.description: The Ferry captain makes these during quieter periods of shipping pirate failures back to life.

bottoms.name: Frostbite Trousers
bottoms.description: Nice warm legs are the key to making a speedy escape with treasure in hand.

bottoms.name: Frozen Horizon Trousers
bottoms.description: Form-fitting trousers to help keep those uncomfortable icy breezes at bay.

bottoms.name: Gilded Phoenix Trousers
bottoms.description: Now those are some posh trousers. You must have pockets full of gold!

bottoms.name: Golden Banana Trousers
bottoms.description: Let's hope that despite being Banana trousers, these won't split on you.

bottoms.name: Legendary Trousers
bottoms.description: At outpost shops be the envy of browsers, as you stride past in your legendary trousers.

bottoms.name: Lucky Hand Trousers
bottoms.description: Diamond-shaped kneepads provide extra protection against wear and tear, for pirates who don’t like taking chances.

bottoms.name: Naval Commander Trousers
bottoms.description: Loose-fitting trousers are helpful in a scuffle - not that you'd ever lower yourself to such behaviour.

bottoms.name: Sailor Trousers
bottoms.description: Available in a vast range of sizes and lengths. All equally dull.

bottoms.name: Sapphire Blade Trousers
bottoms.description: When you don't know what's around the next corner, a good pair of trousers is probably a good idea.

bottoms.description: When you don't know what's around the next corner, a good pair of trousers is probably a good idea.

bottoms.name: Trousers of the Wailing Barnacle
bottoms.description: There may be deep-sea critters squirming around in these trousers, but they’re more scared of you...
